name: Hiyamee
description: Hiyamee connects top tech talent with fast-growing companies. This 7-million strong global community hosts over 600 tech meetups and hiring events annually across 30+ Indian and US cities. They also specialize in successful diversity hiring initiatives.
features: Access to curated talent from multiple social media platforms
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Get the Right Tools and Services for Your Business
ShortDescription: India's largest Community for Tech Talent

Highlights.name: Massive Tech Talent Pool
Highlights.description: Hiyamee boasts a community of over 7 million tech professionals globally. This vast network offers companies access to a rich pool of potential hires.

Highlights.name: Extensive Networking & Hiring Events
Highlights.description: Hosting over 600 events annually across 30+ cities in India and the US, Hiyamee facilitates valuable connections between tech professionals and companies.

Highlights.name: Diversity Hiring Expertise
Highlights.description: Hiyamee helps companies build inclusive teams with expertise in running successful diversity hiring campaigns.

enhanced_description: Hiyamee is India's largest community for tech talent, founded in 2016 and headquartered in Bangalore. It connects over 7 million tech professionals globally with fast-growing companies. The platform hosts more than 600 tech meetups and hiring events annually across 30+ cities in India and the US, facilitating valuable connections between tech professionals and companies. Hiyamee specializes in successful diversity hiring initiatives, helping companies build inclusive teams. It provides access to its proprietary community, curated talent from multiple social media platforms, and global talent communities, with the objective to help businesses hire top tech talent faster and more efficiently.
key_use_cases: Organizing and participating in tech meetups and hiring events
Accessing curated talent from social media platforms
Leveraging global talent communities for recruitment
Facilitating connections between companies and tech professionals
